name: Rhythm Blade Beatdown
description:
This is my solo submission to Game Dev Bois' Rhythm Game Jam. Designed, drawn, composed, and programmed (by yours truly) over the span of about a week.

The game was created in Unity, with the help of Melanchall's DryWetMidi library and adapted from SkyanSam's thorough and helpful video tutorial (thanks!). 

Original music was composed in Famitracker. All graphics were made through a combination of LibreSprite and Adobe Photoshop. Hope you enjoy!
